<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?><rss version="2.0" xml:base="https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls-old?field_rc_date_value%5Bmin%5D&field_rc_date_value%5Bmax%5D&field_rc_heading_value=&field_rc_hazard_description_value=&field_rc_manufactured_in_value=&field_rc_manufacturers_value=&field_rc_number_value=" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom" xmlns:fb="http://www.facebook.com/2008/fbml" xmlns:og="http://ogp.me/ns#" xmlns:article="http://ogp.me/ns/article#" xmlns:book="http://ogp.me/ns/book#" xmlns:profile="http://ogp.me/ns/profile#" xmlns:video="http://ogp.me/ns/video#" xmlns:product="http://ogp.me/ns/product#" xmlns:content="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/content/" xmlns:foaf="http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/" xmlns:rdfs="http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#" xmlns:sioc="http://rdfs.org/sioc/ns#" xmlns:sioct="http://rdfs.org/sioc/types#" xmlns:skos="http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#">
  <channel>
    <title>Recall List</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls-old?field_rc_date_value%5Bmin%5D&field_rc_date_value%5Bmax%5D&field_rc_heading_value=&field_rc_hazard_description_value=&field_rc_manufactured_in_value=&field_rc_manufacturers_value=&field_rc_number_value=</link>
    <description></description>
    <language>en</language>
     <atom:link href="https://www.cpsc.gov/Newsroom/CPSC-RSS-Feed/Recalls-RSS" rel="self" type="application/rss+xml" />
      <item>
    <title>Specialized Bicycle Components Recalls Bicycles Due to Crash Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/specialized-bicycle-components-recalls-bicycles-due-to-crash-hazard</link>
    <description>The fork on the bicycle can break and cause the rider to lose control, posing a crash hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 15, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Rural King Recalls Electric Blankets and Throws Due to Fire and Burn Hazards</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/rural-king-recalls-electric-blankets-and-throws-due-to-fire-and-burn-hazards</link>
    <description>The blankets’ and throws’ electric cord can overheat and catch on fire, posing fire and burn hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>February 15, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>ISO Beauty Recalls Hair Dryers Due to Burn Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/iso-beauty-recalls-hair-dryers-due-to-burn-hazard</link>
    <description>The cord can become brittle near the base of the dryer, posing burn hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>February 14, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Tea Collection Recalls Children’s Rompers Due to Choking Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/tea-collection-recalls-childrens-rompers-due-to-choking-hazard</link>
    <description>The snaps near the collar can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.</description>
     <pubDate>February 13, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>West Elm Recalls Glass Tables Due to Risk of Injury (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/west-elm-recalls-glass-tables-due-to-risk-of-injury-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The tempered glass top can shatter unexpectedly, posing a laceration and injury hazard to the user or bystanders.</description>
     <pubDate>February 13, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Fujitsu Recalls Battery Packs for Fujitsu Notebook Computers and Workstations Due to Fire and Burn Hazards</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/fujitsu-recalls-battery-packs-for-fujitsu-notebook-computers-and-workstations-due-to</link>
    <description>The lithium-ion battery packs can overheat, posing burn and fire hazards to consumers.</description>
     <pubDate>February 8, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Poppin Recalls Pitch Rolling Chairs Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/poppin-recalls-pitch-rolling-chairs-due-to-fall-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The seat plate can break and detach from the seat base, posing a fall hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 8, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Husqvarna Recalls Residential Zero Turn Riding Mowers Due to Fire Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/husqvarna-recalls-residential-zero-turn-riding-mowers-due-to-fire-hazard</link>
    <description>An incorrect routing of the fuel line can cause it to wear and leak, posing a fire hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 8, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Lenovo Recalls ThinkPad Laptops Due to Fire Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/lenovo-recalls-thinkpad-laptops-due-to-fire-hazard</link>
    <description>An unfastened screw can damage the battery causing ovearheating, posing a fire hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 6, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Kohler Recalls Gasoline Engines Due to Risk of Fuel Leak and Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/kohler-recalls-gasoline-engines-due-to-risk-of-fuel-leak-and-fire-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The engines have a faulty fuel cap, which can allow over-pressurization in the fuel tank, posing a risk of a fuel leak and fire hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 6, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Tiffany &amp; Co. Recalls Crystal Mugs Due to Burn and Laceration Hazards (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/tiffany-co-recalls-crystal-mugs-due-to-burn-and-laceration-hazards-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The mugs can crack or break when used with or exposed to hot liquids, posing burn and laceration hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>February 6, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>B &amp; P Lamp Supply Recalls Lamp Sockets Due to Fire Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/b-p-lamp-supply-recalls-lamp-sockets-due-to-fire-hazard</link>
    <description>The lamp socket screw does not fasten tightly which can result in arcing or overheating, posing a fire hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>February 5, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Infant Bodysuits Recalled Due to Choking Hazard; Made by Alstyle</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/infant-bodysuits-recalled-due-to-choking-hazard-made-by-alstyle</link>
    <description>The snaps at the crotch can detach, posing a choking hazard to young children.</description>
     <pubDate>February 1, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Cordless Electric Chainsaws Recalled Due to Injury Hazard; Distributed by Hongkong Sun Rise Trading</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/cordless-electric-chainsaws-recalled-due-to-injury-hazard-distributed-by-hongkong-sun</link>
    <description>The chain brake guard in the cordless electric chainsaw can fail and allow the chainsaw to continue operating, posing an injury hazard to users.</description>
     <pubDate>February 1, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Hunter Douglas Recalls Privacy Sheer Blinds Due to Strangulation Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/hunter-douglas-recalls-privacy-sheer-blinds-due-to-strangulation-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The cord restraints on the combination wand/cord of the sheer blinds can break, posing a strangulation hazard to children.</description>
     <pubDate>February 1, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>John Deere Recalls ZTrak Riding Mowers Due to Laceration Hazard (Recall Alert) </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/john-deere-recalls-ztrak-riding-mowers-due-to-laceration-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The mower’s blades can continue to rotate under power when the operator leaves the seat, posing a laceration risk to the user or bystander.</description>
     <pubDate>February 1, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>John Deere Recalls Compact Utility Tractors Due To Crash and Injury Hazards (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/john-deere-recalls-compact-utility-tractors-due-to-crash-and-injury-hazards-recall</link>
    <description>The brakes can fail, posing crash and injury hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>January 31, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Vornado Air Recalls Cribside Space Heaters Due to Fire and Burn Hazards</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/vornado-air-recalls-cribside-space-heaters-due-to-fire-and-burn-hazards</link>
    <description>A broken motor mount can allow the electric heating element to come in contact with the interior plastic materials and ignite, posing fire and burn hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>January 31, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>LEDVANCE Recalls Recessed Canister Light Kits Due to Shock and Electrocution Hazards      </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/ledvance-recalls-recessed-canister-light-kits-due-to-shock-and-electrocution-hazards</link>
    <description>The recalled recessed canister light kits can short circuit, posing a shock and electrocution hazard when consumers try to troubleshoot flickering lights.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</description>
     <pubDate>January 31, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Walgreens Pain and Itch Relief Cream Recalled by Natureplex Due to Failure to Meet Child Resistant Closure Requirement </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/walgreens-pain-and-itch-relief-cream-recalled-by-natureplex-due-to-failure-to-meet</link>
    <description>The packaging is not child resistant as required by the Poison Prevention Packaging Act. The pain and itch relief cream contains lidocaine, posing a risk of poisoning to young children.</description>
     <pubDate>January 30, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>VTech Recalls Lights &amp; Lullabies Travel Mobiles Due to Injury Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/vtech-recalls-lights-lullabies-travel-mobiles-due-to-injury-hazard</link>
    <description>The clamp attaching the mobile to the crib rail can break causing the mobile to fall, posing an injury hazard to an infant in the crib.</description>
     <pubDate>January 25, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Rockler Recalls Murphy Bed Kits Due to Tip-Over and Entrapment Hazards (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/rockler-recalls-murphy-bed-kits-due-to-tipover-and-entrapment-hazards-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The hardware kits used to secure the wooden wall enclosures to the wall studs do not provide sufficient bracing support, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in death or injuries to children.</description>
     <pubDate>January 25, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Elkay Recalls Water Coolers and Bottle Filling Stations Due to Shock Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/elkay-recalls-water-coolers-and-bottle-filling-stations-due-to-shock-hazard</link>
    <description>Internal screws that secure the grounding wire can break and allow the grounding wire to become loose, posing a shock hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>January 25, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>VTech Recalls Infant Rattles Due to Choking Hazard </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/vtech-recalls-infant-rattles-due-to-choking-hazard</link>
    <description>The ears on the elephant rattles can break off, posing a choking hazard to young children.</description>
     <pubDate>January 25, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Fashion Accessory Bazaar Recalls Fidget Spinner Keychains Due to Choking Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/fashion-accessory-bazaar-recalls-fidget-spinner-keychains-due-to-choking-hazard</link>
    <description>The center post on the fidget spinner can become loose or fall out, posing a choking hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>January 24, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Panasonic Recalls Flat Screen Televisions and Swivel Stands Due to Tip-Over Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/panasonic-recalls-flat-screen-televisions-and-swivel-stands-due-to-tip-over-hazard</link>
    <description>The mounting screws that connect the swivel stand to the television can come loose and cause the television to tip over and fall off the stand unexpectedly, posing serious tip-over and entrapment hazards that can result in injuries or death to children.</description>
     <pubDate>January 19, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Bassinets Recalled Due to Violation of Bassinet &amp; Cradle Standard; Made By Multipro (Recall Alert) </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/bassinets-recalled-due-to-violation-of-bassinet-cradle-standard-made-by-multipro-recall</link>
    <description>The bassinets fail to meet the mandatory federal safety standard for bassinets and cradles, posing fall and entrapment hazards to babies.</description>
     <pubDate>January 18, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Hillsdale Furniture Recalls Bar Stools Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/hillsdale-furniture-recalls-bar-stools-due-to-fall-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The stool seat can loosen or break off at the base, posing a fall hazard to the user.</description>
     <pubDate>January 18, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Bed Bath &amp; Beyond Recalls Hudson Comforters by UGG Due to Risk of Mold Exposure</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/bed-bath-beyond-recalls-hudson-comforters-by-ugg-due-to-risk-of-mold-exposure</link>
    <description>Mold can be present, posing a risk of respiratory or other infections in individuals with compromised immune systems, damaged lungs or an allergy to mold.</description>
     <pubDate>January 18, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Fujifilm Recalls Power Adapter Wall Plugs Sold with Digital Cameras Due to Shock Hazard </title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/fujifilm-recalls-power-adapter-wall-plugs-sold-with-digital-cameras-due-to-shock-hazard</link>
    <description>The power adapter wall plug can crack, break or detach and remain in the wall and expose live electrical contacts, posing a shock hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>January 16, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Coldwater Creek Recalls Snow Globes Due to Fire Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/coldwater-creek-recalls-snow-globes-due-to-fire-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>Light refraction through the globes can singe or melt items in contact with or in the immediate proximity, posing a fire hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>January 12, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Skip Hop Recalls Convertible High Chairs Due to Fall Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/skip-hop-recalls-convertible-high-chairs-due-to-fall-hazard</link>
    <description>The front legs on the highchair can detach from the seat, posing fall and injury hazards to children.</description>
     <pubDate>January 9, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>HP Recalls Batteries for Notebook Computers and Mobile Workstations Due to Fire and Burn Hazards</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/hp-recalls-batteries-for-notebook-computers-and-mobile-workstations-due-to-fire-and</link>
    <description>The lithium-ion batteries can overheat, posing fire and burn hazards</description>
     <pubDate>January 4, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>SureFit Recalls Riding Lawn Mower Blade Spindle Shafts Due to Impact Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/SureFit-Recalls-Riding-Lawn-Mower-Blade-Spindle-Shafts-Due-to-Impact-Hazard-Recall-Alert</link>
    <description>The blade spindle shaft can break during lawn mowing and the broken blade pieces can become projectiles. This poses a risk of an impact injury to bystanders or damage to property.</description>
     <pubDate>January 4, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Comfort Research Recalls Bean Bag Chair Covers Due to Risks of Entrapment, Suffocation to Children</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2018/comfort-research-recalls-bean-bag-chair-covers-due-to-risks-of-entrapment-suffocation</link>
    <description>The zippers on the bean bag chair covers can be opened by children who can then crawl inside, become entrapped, suffocate or choke on the bean bag chair's foam beads.</description>
     <pubDate>January 2, 2018</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Western Gas Recalls to Inspect Propane Gas Due To Fire and Burn Hazards</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2017/western-gas-recalls-to-inspect-propane-gas-due-to-fire-and-burn-hazards</link>
    <description>The recalled propane may not contain sufficient levels of odorant to help alert consumers to a gas leak. Failure to detect leaking gas can present fire, explosion and thermal burn hazards.&nbsp;&nbsp;</description>
     <pubDate>December 28, 2017</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>The Land of Nod Recalls Toddler Beds Due to Entrapment Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2017/the-land-of-nod-recalls-toddler-beds-due-to-entrapment-hazard-recall-alert</link>
    <description>The headboard can disconnect from the bed frame and fall onto the bed, posing an entrapment hazard to children.</description>
     <pubDate>December 28, 2017</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>HealthPostures Recalls IntimateRider Chair and RiderMate Bench Due to Fall Hazard (Recall Alert)</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2017/healthpostures-recalls-intimaterider-chair-and-ridermate-bench-due-to-fall-hazard</link>
    <description>The stitching on the cloth cover can loosen, posing fall and injury hazards.</description>
     <pubDate>December 27, 2017</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Rocky Mountain Bicycles Recall Mountain Bicycles Due to Crash Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2017/rocky-mountain-bicycles-recall-mountain-bicycles-due-to-crash-hazard</link>
    <description>The brake cable housing was not secured properly during manufacturing, which can cause brake failure, posing a crash hazard to the rider.</description>
     <pubDate>December 27, 2017</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  <item>
    <title>Vilo Home Recalls Marseille Dining Benches Due to Fall Hazard</title>
    <link>https://www.cpsc.gov/Recalls/2017/vilo-home-recalls-marseille-dining-benches-due-to-fall-hazard</link>
    <description>The foam seat cushion and base can crack in the middle and cause the bench to collapse, posing a fall hazard.</description>
     <pubDate>December 22, 2017</pubDate>
 <dc:creator />
 <guid isPermaLink="false" />
  </item>
  </channel>
</rss>
